PRODUCT STORY

LaMelo Ball’s third signature shoe MB.03 takes a trip to the never before seen alternative universe that is the Melo world. Highlighted by slime inspired rubber wrap-ups and an engineered knit upper with scratch cutouts, the MB.03 is truly Not From Here. The slime sole and space-age PUMA Hoops tech, including NITROFOAM™, make tournament ready look interplanetary.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • NITROFOAM™ : Enclosed nitrogen-infused foam designed to provide responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package

DETAILS

  • Engineered mesh upper
  • TPU heel clip
  • NITROFOAM™ Infused midsole
  • High abrasion, non-slip rubber outsole
  • PUMA x LAFRANCÉ co-branding
  • LaMelo Ball branding

PRODUCT STORY

LaMelo Ball’s third signature shoe MB.03 takes a trip to the never before seen alternative universe that is the Melo world. Highlighted by slime inspired rubber wrap-ups and an engineered knit upper with scratch cutouts, the MB.03 is truly Not From Here. The slime sole and space-age PUMA Hoops tech, including NITROFOAM™, make tournament ready look interplanetary.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • NITROFOAM™ : Enclosed nitrogen-infused foam designed to provide responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package

DETAILS

  • Engineered mesh upper
  • TPU heel clip
  • NITROFOAM™ Infused midsole
  • High abrasion, non-slip rubber outsole
  • PUMA x LAFRANCÉ co-branding
  • LaMelo Ball branding
